unit

Class MovingUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • unit.ObjectOnMap
              • unit.MovingUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Player

    public abstract class MovingUnit
extends ObjectOnMap
    MovingUnit is a class that represents a moving panel
    Author:
    Peter
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • moveLeft

        public void moveLeft(boolean isReturning)
        moveLeft animation uses _i as progress does diffrent animations based on isReturning
        Parameters:
        isReturning - - if true the animation will be a bump else the animation would be a block movement

      • moveRight
